template.name: unp
template.value: UPDATE Cirts.$table$ SET IsProtected = 0 WHERE IntId IN ($values$); $end$

template.value:
ALTER TABLE dbo.$Entity$ ADD [CreatedByUserId] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_$Entity$DefaultCreateUser DEFAULT '10000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'; GO
ALTER TABLE dbo.$Entity$ DROP CONSTRAINT DF_$Entity$DefaultCreateUser;
ALTER TABLE dbo.$Entity$ ADD [CreatedUtcDate] [datetime] NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_$Entity$DefaultCreateTime DEFAULT GETUTCDATE(); GO
ALTER TABLE dbo.$Entity$ DROP CONSTRAINT DF_$Entity$DefaultCreateTime;
ALTER TABLE dbo.$Entity$ ADD [ModifiedByUserId] [uniqueidentifier] NULL; GO
ALTER TABLE dbo.$Entity$ ADD [ModifiedUtcDate] [datetime] NULL; GO
ALTER TABLE dbo.$Entity$ ADD [RowVersion] [timestamp] NOT NULL; GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[$Entity$] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_$Entity$_CreatedBy] FOREIGN KEY ([CreatedByUserId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[AspNetUsers] ([Id]) GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[$Entity$] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_$Entity$_ModifiedBy] FOREIGN KEY ([ModifiedByUserId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[AspNetUsers] ([Id]) GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[$TypePascalCase$] ( [Id] [INT] IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, $END$ [CreatedByUserId] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [CreatedUtcDate] [DATETIME] NOT NULL, [ModifiedByUserId] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NULL, [ModifiedUtcDate] [DATETIME] NULL, [RowVersion] [TIMESTAMP] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_$TypePascalCase$] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([Id] ASC) ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[$TypePascalCase$] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_$TypePascalCase$_CreatedBy] FOREIGN KEY ([CreatedByUserId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[AspNetUsers] ([Id]) GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[$TypePascalCase$] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_$TypePascalCase$_ModifiedBy] FOREIGN KEY ([ModifiedByUserId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[AspNetUsers] ([Id])

template.name: rtab
template.value:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[$TypePascalCase$] ( [Id] [INT] IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, [Name] [nvarchar](256) NOT NULL, [Code] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [DisplayOrder] [INT] NOT NULL, [IsActive] [bit] NOT NULL, [CreatedByUserId] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [CreatedUtcDate] [DATETIME] NOT NULL, [ModifiedByUserId] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NULL, [ModifiedUtcDate] [DATETIME] NULL, [RowVersion] [TIMESTAMP] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_$TypePascalCase$] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([Id] ASC) ) ON [PRIMARY] GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[$TypePascalCase$] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_$TypePascalCase$_CreatedBy] FOREIGN KEY ([CreatedByUserId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[AspNetUsers] ([Id]) GO
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[$TypePascalCase$] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_$TypePascalCase$_ModifiedBy] FOREIGN KEY ([ModifiedByUserId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[AspNetUsers] ([Id])
